and just wanted to take a few moments to

recognition of David Carr life his
contributions to the Public Service
Commission and others
whereas the Mississippi Public Service
Commission lost a value and special
member of their team on December 28 2022
David Nelson Carr
whereas David Carr a Gulfport
Mississippi native began working for the
Mississippi Public Service Commission in
September 2012 and special counsel to
the commission for Federal Energy
affairs
whereas David Carr was the commission's
primary staff person on matters related
to The mid-condent Independent system
operator the organization of maestro
States the Entergy Regional State
committee the Federal Energy Regulatory
Commission and so much more
whereas David Carr was a very highly
regarded by his peers all over the
country and he was relied heavily on for
his expertise his guidance his
thoughtfulness on intricate topics such
as Regional transmission planning cost
allocation generator interconnection
resource adequacy and many more topics
whereas his deep knowledge and
professionalism was a true asset for the
commission and he always worked hard to
present the interests represent the
interest of rate payers of the state of
Mississippi
whereas aside from his professional life
at the commission
David Carr had many passions including
cooking Ole Miss football and he shared
these many gifts with his friends and
family
whereas his sense of humor his kindness
his energy and his graciousness
graciousness enrich those fortunate
enough to know and work with him now
therefore it be it resolve the
Mississippi Public Service Commission
recognizes David Nelson Carr's
achievements and his contributions to
the world of utilities specifically to
the commission and his staff members and
expresses its appreciation and gratitude
for those contributions and extends
their deepest sympathies and prayers to
his loving family down at the
Mississippi Public Service Commission on
this 10th day of January 2023.
